protein.specific_function: May be involved in a redox-related process. May play a role in the myopathies of selenium deficiency

reference.reference_text: Gu QP, Beilstein MA, Vendeland SC, Lugade A, Ream W, Whanger PD: Conserved features of selenocysteine insertion sequence (SECIS) elements in selenoprotein W cDNAs from five species. Gene. 1997 Jul 9;193(2):187-96.
